actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt distributions to members of the reserves while on active duty from the additional tax on early distributions from qualified retirement plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt distributions from qualified retirement plans to members of the Armed Forces reserves while such members are on active duty from the ten percent additional tax on early distributions.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt distributions to members of the reserves while on active duty from the additional tax on early distributions from qualified retirement plans.
